entry.title: $2700 // ALL NEW+ OPEN LAYOUT_WASHER-DRYER_BIG 2BR_ 3OAVE on 38-ST
entry.content:
l o c a t i on , LOCATION , LOCATION , IN The HEAT OF ASTORIA 3OTH AVENUE
